Uses of Class
jalds.alds.ds.graphs.Vertex

Packages that use Vertex
jalds.alds.al.graphs Contains a collection of graph algorithms. 
jalds.alds.ds.graphs Contains the graph data structures that is used by the graph algorithms.

Methods in jalds.alds.ds.graphs with parameters of type Vertex
 void Graph.addEdge(Vertex a, Vertex b)
          Adds an edge from a into b, if it is an UN directed graph will also add the edge from b into a, if the vertex was not previously added using the addVertex method, this will add it In an un directed graph self loops are forbidden, so will not add any edges to the graph
NOTE: At present does not check for duplicates.
